circumstances:
Left RAF Coningsby at 1930LT on March 29 on a bombing mission to the Frisian Islands. While approaching the Dutch coast, the bomber went out of control and crashed into the North Sea. No trace of the aircraft nor the crew was found. 
Crew (106th Squadron):
F/Sgt Edgar Robert Dimond, 
F/Sgt Henry Chaytor Bussell, 
P/O Harold Selwyn Brough, 
F/Sgt John Seery, 
Sgt Donald Swaine, 
Sgt Alexander Currie, 
Sgt Francis Alfred Fry.
